price: 他们是连结安拉命人连结者的，是敬畏他们的主的，是畏惧严厉的清算的。
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَصِلُونَ مَآ أَمَرَ ٱللَّهُ بِهِۦٓ أَن يُوصَلَ وَيَخۡشَوۡنَ رَبَّهُمۡ وَيَخَافُونَ سُوٓءَ ٱلۡحِسَابِ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Muhammad Makin
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Chinese by Muhammad Makin. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna yaṣilūna mā amara al-lahu bihi an yūṣala wayakhshawna rabbahum wayakhāfūna sūa al-ḥisābi
